#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

char inp[1002][1002];
int dp[1002][1002];

int main(){
	
	int test;
	
	scanf("%d",&test);
	
	while(test--){
		int n,k;
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
		
		int i,j;
		char l;
		
		scanf("%c",l);
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%s", inp[i]);
		}
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0;j<n; j++)
				dp[i][j] = inp[i][j] - 48;
		}
		
		for(i=n-2;i>=0;i--){
			for(j=0;j<n;j++){
				if(i%2 == 0){
					//alice ka level
					
					int a  = dp[i+1][j];
					
					if(j>0)
						a = min(a,dp[i+1][j-1]);
						
					if(j!=(n-1))
						a = min(a,dp[i+1][j+1]);
						
					dp[i][j] = a + dp[i][j];
					
				}
				else{
					int a  = dp[i+1][j];
					
					if(j>0)
						a = max(a,dp[i+1][j-1]);
						
					if(j!=(n-1))
						a = max(a,dp[i+1][j+1]);
						
					dp[i][j] = a + dp[i][j];
				}
			}
		}
		
		int cnt=0;
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			if(dp[0][i] >= k)
				cnt++;
		}
		
		printf("%d\n",cnt);
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
